product_name: SmartWool New Classic Rib Socks - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The SmartWool New Classic Rib Socks are cushioned crew socks for casual wear that offer wonderful stretch and luxurious, soft merino wool next to your skin. WOW(TM) (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in the heel and forefoot area, improving durability and overall comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The SmartWool New Classic Rib Socks are cushioned crew socks for casual wear that offer wonderful stretch and luxurious, soft merino wool next to your skin.
